# CI/CD Pipeline Screenshots

This file was created to trigger the CI/CD workflows for demonstration purposes.

## Workflows Configured

1. **Backend CI/CD** - Tests and deploys backend changes
2. **Frontend CI/CD** - Builds and deploys frontend changes
3. **Full Stack CI** - Runs integration tests

## How to View Workflows

1. Go to the "Actions" tab in this GitHub repository
2. View the workflow runs triggered by commits
3. Click on individual runs to see detailed logs

---

*Last updated: 2025-11-17*
